sections.summary: teacher devoted to helping children think creatively, solve problems independently and respect themselves and others. teacher focused on implementing highly effective instructional practices to improve student learning and academic performance. highlights friendly. qualified tutor complex problem solver, charting and recordkeeping active listener positive reinforcement methods reliable and punctual skilled in working with special needs children excellent communication skills approachable cheerful and energetic complex problem solver
